content:
From: Olga Vovk <ovovk@samvit-solutions.com>
Dear all,
Does anybody know if any changes planned to be made in us-core profiles (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/) for R5?
Thank you!

Olga Vovk
<:3)))~~~~
US Core road map can be found here. We have no plans to publish a FHIR R5 version prior to the FHIR R5 Release.

Hi Eric,
Thank you so much for answering!
Best,
Olga
You may also check the upcoming version - http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/2021Jan/
